serverInfo.name: Google-Audio
serverInfo.description: Text-to-speech and audio processing with Google. Generate natural voices, support multi‑speaker TTS (keep ≤4 turns), and handle audio for narration, prompts and apps. Note: multi‑speaker synthesis can be slow; batch thoughtfully.

instructions: Do not include more than 4 speaker turns in a single TTS tool call. Creating Audio Speech, especially multi speaker TTS, can be slow.
